management

Interface Observable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, Ellipse, Line, Polygon, RegularPolygon, Shape, Star, Text

    public interface Observable
    This interface manages the interaction between the actual shapes and the layers. It notifies when something has changed (e.g.: A shape has been moved or a new shape has been added).
    See Also:
    Observer, Shape

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifyObservers()
      This method notifies the observer when something has changed.
      void register(Observer observer)
      Registers new observable objects.
      void unregister(Observer observer)
      Unregisters observable objects.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        Registers new observable objects.
        Parameters:
        observer - the observer which gets registered

      • unregister

        void unregister(Observer observer)
        Unregisters observable objects.
        Parameters:
        observer - the observer which gets unregistered

      • notifyObservers

        void notifyObservers()
        This method notifies the observer when something has changed.
